# GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventScreenshots | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventScreenshots ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventScreenshots)

-  GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventScreenshots 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventScreenshots

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventScreenshots#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appEventScreenshots
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventScreenshots#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventScreenshots#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appEventScreenshots#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppEventLocalizationAppEventScreenshotsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventlocalizationappeventscreenshotslinkagesresponse)`OK`
